no-dialogs.title: You have no dialogues yet
no-dialogs.message: Find people you know and start a conversation with them.

messages.selectChat: Select a chat to start messaging
messages.first: Send a message to start a conversation

empty.title: Looks like you don't have any messages yet
empty.subtitle: Send a message to start a conversation

lastSeenForALongTime: Last seen a long time ago

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this dialog?

deleteAccount.title: Kas olete kindel, et soovite oma konto kustutada?

sessions.title: Session management
sessions.error: An error occurred while fetching the sessions. Please try again later.

blockedUsers.title: Blocked users
blockedUsers.label: {{count}} blocked users
blockedUsers.empty: You don't have any blocked users.
blockedUsers.error: An error occurred while fetching the blocked users. Please try again later.

login.title: Login
login.success: Congratulations! You have successfully logged in. Please check your email to verify your account.

forgot-password.title: Forgot password
forgot-password.description: Enter your email address to reset your password
forgot-password.success: An email has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

reset-password.title: Reset password
reset-password.description: Enter your new password to continue.

activate.title: Activate account
activate.description: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now login.
activate.emptyToken: You need to provide token to activate your account.
activate.success: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now login.

two-factor.title: Two-factor authentication
two-factor.description: Enter the code from your authenticator app.

new-device.title: New device confirmation
new-device.description: You are signed in from a new device. Please enter the code we sent you by email.

errors.userNotFound: We couldn't find an account with that username or email. Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.incorrectPassword: Wrong password. Check your credentials and try again.
errors.resetPasswordTokenIsNotValid: The reset password token is not valid.
errors.userNotActiveCheckEmail: The user is not active. Please check your email.
errors.usernameOrEmailIsTaken: The username or email is already taken.
errors.twoFactorCodeIsNotValid: The two-factor code is not valid.
errors.newDeviceCodeIsEmpty: The new device confirmation code is empty.
errors.newDeviceCodeIsNotValid: The new device confirmation code is not valid.
errors.cannotUseSamePassword: You cannot use the same password.
errors.invalidActivationCode: The activation code is not valid.

errors.usernameHasIncorrectLength: Username must be at least 3 and not more than 50 characters long.
errors.emailHasIncorrectLength: The email has incorrect length. It should be between 3 and 254 characters.
errors.passwordHasIncorrectLength: Password must be at least 8 and not more than 32 characters.
errors.passwordConfirmHasIncorrectLength: Password confirmation must be at least 8 and not more than 32 characters.
errors.firstNameHasIncorrectLength: First name must be at least 3 and not more than 50 characters long.
